amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 625, to prevent the SEC from developing or finalizing a rule that requires the disclosure of political contributions to tax exempt organizations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 236 (Roll no. 365).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 236 (Roll no. 365).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Kildee.
